rows.label: tlk400701_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, Rex. Good to see you.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0002
rows.name: Yeah, um, hi...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0003
rows.name: Don't look so down.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0050
rows.name:
The Boss left a message with me.
To give to you, if anything ever
happened to him.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0004
rows.name:
A message from Vandham-san, for me?!
You don't think...he knew he'd...?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0005
rows.name:
Maybe. But if you ask me,
I don't think he knew.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0006
rows.name:
It's just the kind of life us mercenaries
live. You never know which day might
turn out to be your last.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0007
rows.name:
So it's not uncommon for us to leave
messages like this, just in case.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0009
rows.name:
Now listen up, because this
is important.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0010
rows.name:
"Rex. I leave the Hræsvelgr Mercenaries
in your hands."

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0013
rows.name: Um... Is there anything else?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0014
rows.name: Nope. That's your lot.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0015
rows.name:
What?! Leaving it to me...
That's a joke, right?!

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0016
rows.name:
This is no joke, kid.
It's Vandham through and through - he
says what he means, no more, no less.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0017
rows.name:
Well, I mean, I won't deny it's simple,
but... Why would he ask me to...?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0018
rows.name:
The Boss thought a lot of you, kid.
And I think you've struck a chord
with the rest of us, too.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0019
rows.name:
You're an honest, straightforward guy,
with plenty of nerve and resolve.
And...you give us all hope.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0020
rows.name:
I don't think...I can really take
all the credit for any of that...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0021
rows.name:
Maybe not.
But there's something about you, kid.
Everyone feels it.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0022
rows.name:
So tell me, Rex.
Will you do as the Boss asks?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0023
rows.name: Take over the Hræsvelgr Mercenaries?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0024
rows.name: Yes

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0025
rows.name: No

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0026
rows.name:
...All right.
I'll do it!

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0027
rows.name:
Strong words, well said!
Nothing less from the guy old
Vandham staked his hopes in!

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0028
rows.name:
But, um... What exactly would I
have to do, as the band's leader?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0051
rows.name:
You said you don't have any other
messages from Vandham-san, right?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0029
rows.name: Nope. He's a man of few words.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0030
rows.name:
But of course, you'll have me
and Zuo to help you out.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0031
rows.name:
We couldn't ask you to suddenly
handle all the operations on your own.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0032
rows.name:
You just dole out the big general
orders for now. You can count on
us to take care of the details.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0033
rows.name:
And then...I guess we'll see how
things go from there.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0034
rows.name: Okay. I guess I can probably handle that.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0035
rows.name:
Right! Then let's start by explaining
how things work around here.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0036
rows.name:
Our little band takes on all kinds of
assignments from all across Alst.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0037
rows.name:
From escort missions and clearing out
monsters, down to gathering materials,
and sometimes even smaller things.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0038
rows.name:
But tell me something, Rex. I get the
feeling you've got more Blades than
you know what to do with. Am I wrong?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0039
rows.name:
If you've got Blades sitting around
doing nothing, you can assign them to
carry out missions as part of the band.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0040
rows.name:
It'll be good experience for them,
and you'll reap the rewards to boot.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0041
tlk400701_msg0042
rows.name: Rex...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0043
rows.name:
Could you think back to
Vandham's last moments?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0044
rows.name:
You're the only ones who were
there to witness it...

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0045
rows.name:
Me and Zuo have no way of
knowing the details.

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0046
rows.name:
How d'you think he felt, at the end?
What led him to sacrifice himself?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0047
rows.name:
Did he believe he'd found something
worth giving his life for?

rows.label: tlk400701_msg0048
rows.name: I want you to think carefully about that.
